p: Annual soil cumulative drainage and available soil water (AW) at maturity did not change with CO 2, but it did decrease with temperature and increase with precipitation under future climate scenarios at both locations ( Table 3). When all factors were combined, significant increases in annual cumulative drainage were found under RCP8.5 2050s and RCP8.5 2080s scenarios compared with baseline scenarios, which were primarily due to the higher annual precipitation ( Table 3).
